snippet.title: Main Assembly - Early Access Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1078920/
Discord: https://discord.gg/Vw73KKh

Build robots with revolutionary free-form crafting tools and control them through powerful visual programming. Overcome solo challenges or play with your friends in multiplayer. Featuring advanced physics like aerodynamics and robot destruction!


--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Main Assembly is a game being developed by Bad Yolk Games in Uppsala Sweden.
Game page: http://www.badyolkgames.com/games

Website: http://www.badyolkgames.com
Facebook: http://facebook.com/BadYolkGames
Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/BadYolkGames
Instagram: http://www.instagram.com/BadYolkGames

Main Assembly uses the Unreal® Engine. Unreal® is a trademark or registered trademark of Epic Games, Inc. in the United States of America and elsewhere.
Unreal® Engine, Copyright 1998 – 2019, Epic Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
 (©)Bad Yolk Games AB 2019. Main Assembly® is a trademark of Bad Yolk Games AB.
